revised_title: A Comprehensive Guide to Maritime Science and Navigation
tldr: This article outlines the essential components of a complete treatise on navigation, including ship construction, rigging, sailing, gunnery, loading and unloading, diving for sunken goods, and the general philosophy of the motion and figures of the air, sea, and seasons. It also covers the use of telescopes, depths of the sea, heights of the atmosphere, and making sea-water potable.
